topics.body:
You know speaking of mecha I'm going to be a heretic and say Gundam is one of the best mecha franchises.


Something kind of funny my mom "borrowed" a old copy of one of the series, back when I had insane amounts of dvds, thinking anime is kid friendly and I got this phone call saying that my nephews got her attention immediately about the amount of violence there was.
